name: Kitty Village
description:
We we're to working on this game over the course of 10 days and we had school and jobs besides it, so don't expect too much. if you guys would like we're open for continuing development. 

Features: Combat:

combat is just some basic hack and slash like combat. will be more advanced with combos and other stuff later.

Resource gathering:

just some basic mining for now. but gathering, logging and automation is on the list of what we want to add.

Crafting:

simple click to craft. but could be nice to make something more special later on.

we only got a blacksmith so far. we want to add Armorer and accessory crafting later.

village:

village content like expanding the village more people and workers will come if people want more.
